storyInfo: Vigil has a dream. In his dream, he recalls his long-forgotten past.

attributes.content: The shady undercurrents flow beneath the clamor of Carnevale. Yet Leontuzzo, in his coma, is unaware of any of this.
Leontuzzo has a dream.
In his dream, he recalls his long-forgotten past.
The central figure of this dream is neither his mentor and friend, Lavinia, nor his close companion Demetri, nor even his father, Bernardo.
It is not Carracci, who guided him with such a steady hand, nor is it Rubio, who startled the entire city with a single gunshot.
It is an old man.
An old man that Leontuzzo has buried in the deepest recesses of his memory.
Back then, the Grey Hall had just passed the resolution to construct a new nomadic city.
Back then, Lavinia had not yet arrived in Volsinii, and he, following his father's orders, took over the 'family business'.
Back then, Siracusa's rainy season was still a long one.
I hereby find Enzo... not guilty!
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Not guilty?! He ripped out my sister's vocal chords! Julia is still in a coma!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: There is no evidence directly implicating him.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Of course not! He destroyed the evidence!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: And he assaulted me!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: According to the witnesses' testimony, you were the one who provoked the conflict, and his actions should be considered self-defense.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: However, Enzo has said he understands your anger and will not take action against you, either criminally or civilly, in this matter.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: You mean, he forgives me?
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: You are Julia's brother, so you're my brother as well.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: We need to maintain a good relationship, Ennio.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: You, you bastardo! I never liked you from the start!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Julia insisted on being with you, so I reluctantly agreed.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: And look what happened! You've made her a mute!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: I already told you. That has nothing to do with me.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: She fled back home!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: As her boyfriend, I'm very upset about this myself.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Don't worry. After I bring her back to our home, I'll get some of my boys together and we'll go find the real culprit!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: No. I won't let you take her away.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Signori, what is the meaning of this?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: We're here for a pickup.
attributes.name: Fierce Mafioso

attributes.content: But court is still in session.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Then let's wrap it up quick.
attributes.name: Fierce Mafioso

attributes.content: We're here to take Julia home.
attributes.name: Fierce Mafioso

attributes.content: Well... in that case...
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo?! So the Bellone Underboss has made an appearance.
attributes.name: Fierce Mafioso

attributes.content: Regardless of the circumstances, Julia did flee back home.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: She should be allowed to rest quietly until she wakes up.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even if Enzo is her boyfriend, he should only be allowed to visit her.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I won't allow him to set foot in my home!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Ennio, don't get carried away.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: If Signor Bellone hadn't spoken up, your pastry shop would be a pile of ashes by tomorrow!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Ennio, please respect the court's ruling.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Yes... Your Honor.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Enzo, do you accept Signor Bellone's proposal?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: The Bellone Underboss has spoken. Of course I accept.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: After we're done here in court, I'll go to see her.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Well then, this concludes our proceedings here today.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Buongiorno, Signor Bellone.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Buongiorno, Judge Russo.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Lavinia misses you very much.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I have the letter she sent me. It seems she has a good relationship with Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: You are not satisfied with the outcome here in court today.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Enzo is behind this. Everyone can see that.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I know what you mean.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: However, he has destroyed all the evidence.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Enzo has some complicated famiglia connections.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: This is the most I can do, given the circumstances.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Lavinia tells me you are a man who does not tolerate injustice.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Times have changed, Signore.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: People can change as well.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Now, if you don't mind, I shall take my leave.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: I still have some matters to attend to. Ennio must be quite upset right now, and I need to go talk him through it.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: As you wish.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Ever since the Grey Hall announced the construction of a new nomadic city, Volsinii has been in chaos.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: As you've just seen, the courts stopped functioning a while ago.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Judge Russo is one of the few judges in Volsinii who's still got the balls to hold trial.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Then when do you plan to come back?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Don't you think it's odd for Enzo to be so public about searching for his girlfriend?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This isn't some 'lovers' quarrel'—it's clearly more than that.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He's very impatient.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Are you saying that Julia knows something she isn't supposed to know?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And he won't let it go.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Enzo is with Famiglia Stracci, and they've been causing trouble lately. You've been wanting to make a move against them, right?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Looks like Leon isn't planning on playing the righteous hero. Funny enough, I got some interesting news of my own.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There's an old folk legend among the civilians in Volsinii.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Over the years, many mafiosi who testified in court have met untimely deaths.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The civilians say it's 'divine punishment'.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Well, is it?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Hardly.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The deaths of these people, while somewhat peculiar, are nothing more than assassinations by rival famiglie.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: There's no chance someone is pulling strings behind the scenes?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: They would need a thorough understanding of all famiglia dynamics, as well as the ability to leave no trace of their existence.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I doubt such a person exists in Volsinii.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Perhaps you're right.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: They're getting ready to make a move. We'll talk about this later.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Heh. I never expected the Bellone Underboss to show up there.
attributes.name: Fierce Mafioso

attributes.content: Whatever, as long as I can still see Julia.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: What really happened between you two?
attributes.name: Fierce Mafioso

attributes.content: Nothing, just a misunderstanding. You should head back now. I'll go find Julia.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Tell the Don I'll explain it to him when I get back.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Good. Glad you understand it's on you to explain it to the boss.
attributes.name: Fierce Mafioso

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Well, I better go to Julia before I see the Don...
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: You're ditching your wingman.... interesting.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: After I see Julia, I'll need her to...
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Hey! Outta my way!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: That's.... an Iberian outfit?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Guh—
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Go to hell!
attributes.name: Angry Assassin

attributes.content: What is this, a mob hit? I better stop—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Angry Assassin

attributes.content: We're here to take him back alive.
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: Just leave him to me.
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Angry Assassin

attributes.content: It seems you guessed wrong, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Ouch—
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: What happened to me...?
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: I remember I was going to look for Julia... in the park, when I was jumped by some weirdo in strange clothes... and then...
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: They knocked me out!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: But where am I now? Did someone rescue me?
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: You will die here.
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: Who, who are you?
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: You're really gonna kill me?! I'm a Stracci!!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Famiglia Stracci?
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: You colluded with the Saluzzos to sell the Straccis' stockpile of Originium weapons.
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: Your boss is looking for you. I bet he wants to ask you about that, no?
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: Is Julia up yet?!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Poor Julia. She stumbled upon your business with the Saluzzos, so you tore out her vocal chords.
attributes.name: Strange Assassin

attributes.content: She was planning to rat me out.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: I'm not out to kill her. I still love her.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: You dare claim you love her?!
attributes.name: Angry Assassin

attributes.content: You're... Ennio?! Yes, you've gotta be Ennio!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: I get it. You're upset, and you got a bunch of people together to 'scare' me, right? This is all some kinda show?
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: No. You will die here today.
attributes.name: Angry Assassin

attributes.content: Do you understand what you're saying here, pal?
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Angry Assassin

attributes.content: Your Honor, if you will.
attributes.name: Angry Assassin

attributes.content: You people are crazy. You're all nuts!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: A judge has the power to convict, but not the right to personally take a life.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Moreover, based on what I just heard—there still seems to be some 'wiggle room' in regards to Enzo's sentence.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Am I right, Judge Russo?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Now's the chance—
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: No one said you could leave, Enzo.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Guh...
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: You never cease to surprise me, Signor Bellone.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: The surprising one here is you, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You really had me fooled with your 'professionalism'.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I never suspected that, behind the scenes, you hold the law in complete disregard.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Your actions make you utterly unworthy to wear a robe and hold a gavel.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, Leontuzzo, when have rulings against the Siracusan famiglie ever truly followed the law?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: No one cares about the evidence.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: No one cares about the outcomes.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: I won't let this happen.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Say what you will, but I have seen these things countless times.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Moreover, if one crime isn't enough to warrant death, what about ten? Or a hundred?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Mafiosi love to talk of their opulent famiglie.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: But how many civilians have bled for this opulence? How many skeletons are there in the closet?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Are these sins not worthy of capital punishment?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Following your logic, every mafioso should be killed.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Yes, and what of it?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Sorry...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But I can't let you kill him.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: No one has the right to take another's life.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: One judge who ignores the law... paves the way for a lawless future for countless others.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: 'The future'? Look around you, young Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Siracusa has no future!
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: It does indeed. It's merely obscured by Signora Sicilia, the Dodici Famiglie, and this torrential rain.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even if Lavinia had the ability to influence you, she could never shake your foundation—everything you've been exposed to as a Don's heir—
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Systemic violence, deep-seated arrogance, and pretentious hypocrisy.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: However, you, Signore, you seem to be different.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: You genuinely believe in the existence of justice.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: You, an heir to a famiglia, are standing here to uphold the dignity of the law.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Do you understand? This is—
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Nothing less than the greatest insult to people like us.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Hmph, I'll have to retreat, with Enzo, for now.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Damnit! Where did he go?!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Sorry, Signor Bellone.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: If I stay here, these guys are gonna kill me, but if I go back to the famiglia with you...the Don will kill me!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: I don't wanna get killed.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Merda! That judge is off his rocker!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: How dare you lay hands on a made man?!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: If Leontuzzo hadn't stepped in, I would have been dead meat.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Alas, I must apologize to you, Signor Bellone.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: I sincerely appreciate you saving me from that evil judge, but you already know about my betrayal.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Going back with you is no different than jumping off a bridge.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: But then, what should I do?
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Go hide with the Saluzzos?
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: They might not even think I'm worth their time... wait!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Ratting out Judge Russo would generate massive headlines!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Just think of it! A bunch of civilians killing mafiosi right under the dons' noses!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: The balls on these pricks!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Come to think of it, there must have been some Saluzzos killed too.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: I'm sure they'll wanna know about that!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Signor Bellone...
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Calm down, Ennio.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I come not for revenge, nor to ask you about Judge Russo.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I just have one question for you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Which is...?
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Why do you trust Judge Russo?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're a leader in your famiglia, and an honorable one at that. I can tell.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: I want to trust you.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: But you live in a different world from me.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Even if what you say is true, I will never see it play out, nor will my sister.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: I know how the famiglie get their revenge. They send presents to your doorstep: a hand, a foot, maybe an ear or two.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: If that is the only way justice is served, then at least...
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: I want to see it with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: After our first meeting, Judge Russo took me to meet some people.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Those people... are just like me.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: I'm going to go meet with them again now.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Can I come with you?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If you wish.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: He follows Ennio to a restaurant, where people are already waiting.
Most of them wear a look of grief, and some have visible disabilities.

When they see Leontuzzo following Ennio, they do not react much. They simply move the tables aside, arrange the chairs into a circle, and begin taking their seats one after another. Ennio sits down with them.
Leontuzzo stands at the entrance, silently observing the entire scene.
Today, we gather to share our sorrows with our friends.
attributes.name: Victim A

attributes.content: I'll go first.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: My sister discovered that her boyfriend, a mafioso, was secretly smuggling goods with other famiglie, and as a result, her vocal cords were destroyed.
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: My daughter tried to take her own life on numerous occasions at home. I had to tie her down. Her abuser shows no signs of remorse. In fact they are still trying to take her away from me.
attributes.name: Victim A

attributes.content: My little brother...
attributes.name: Victim B

attributes.content: The victims share stories of terrible things that have happened to them or people around them.
Some people are angry, others are crying, and others are almost too pained to speak.
Yet, they console one another, like brothers and sisters.

Our dear friends and family, or even ourselves, have suffered injustice at the hands of the famiglie—some have died, some have been gravely injured, and others have been left with scars that will never heal.
attributes.name: Victim B

attributes.content: We are hurt, we are enraged, but there is nothing we can do about it.
attributes.name: Victim B

attributes.content: No. Judge Russo has given us hope!
attributes.name: Victim C

attributes.content: That's right. In our moments of despair, it was Judge Russo who told us that we are NOT powerless.
attributes.name: Victim A

attributes.content: Judge Russo told us that we should not lose faith in the law; what we should hate are the villains who trample on it.
attributes.name: Victim C

attributes.content: Judge Russo told us that he would uphold the law and seek justice on our behalf.
attributes.name: Victim B

attributes.content: Yes. Judge Russo will punish the villains for us!
attributes.name: Pastry Shop Owner

attributes.content: Because the law must be just!
attributes.name: Victims

attributes.content: Because our anger is righteous.
attributes.name: Victims

attributes.content: Because the mafiosi should be punished for their sins!
attributes.name: Victims

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There is something that I think I should tell you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The Saluzzos just sent a crew to the courthouse.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: According to our informant, it seems Enzo was spotted at a Saluzzo base.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're going to the courthouse, yes?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I knew it. I was afraid you'd act on impulse.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But, tell me why, Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: This involves the Saluzzos. It's no longer just your business.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You are the Underboss.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Yes, and I want to remain worthy of the title.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In that case, do whatever you think is best.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You wanted to speak with me, Your Honor?
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Yes. The famiglie have been growing more and more ruthless these days.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: I've decided to give the employees of the court a vacation.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Yes. Pass the message along. Everyone who is still at work can return home.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: Are there other matters to discuss?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Yes. Several.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Signor Bellone...
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: He looks at the old man standing before him. The old man is no longer as calm as when they first met, nor as passionate as he had been the night before.
The old man just looks... tired.
Don't you hate me?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Why would I hate you?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Famiglia Saluzzo is coming for you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If only I hadn't let him get away—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If it wasn't this Enzo, it would have been the next Enzo.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: His double-dealing is just more proof of this country's hopelessness.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: I think we have all gotten used to it by now.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: But you, Signore,
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: You could have enjoyed your victory in peace. Why are you taking the risk of coming to see me now?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: I followed Ennio and saw a support group for victims of the famiglie.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm a victim too.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Sixty years of loyalty, and what did I get for it? A package at my doorstep... containing my wife's bloody hand.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: That's when I became one of them.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: But... from what I've seen...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're just acting as their hitman.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: To uphold the dignity of the law, and to ensure that those victims who have lost faith in the famiglie do not lose faith in the law—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You have made a wicked bargain with the victims, signed in blood.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You have far exceeded the bounds of the law.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't believe that everything happening now is what you originally intended.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Whether they coerced me or I raised my blade of my own accord, for their sake, it makes no difference here in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: But you, Signore,
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: What are you planning to do?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Did you come here to see me repent...
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Or to extend your hand in charity?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: You old fool, I'm here to avenge the mafiosi you murdered!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Enzo, I'm impressed by your ability to adapt to your situation.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: (hushed voice) Signor Bellone....?!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: This has nothing to do with you, Signor Bellone.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: I am here on behalf of Famiglia Saluzzo. I shall avenge the countless mafiosi that have died by this bastardo's wicked, bloody hands!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: As for the misunderstandings between us, we shall discuss those later.
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: So, you've got the Saluzzos backing you now.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Y-yes. What of it?!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: That's good then.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Arrogant Mafioso

attributes.content: Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You called?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Tie them all up. Then go give my regards to the Saluzzos. Ask them to send someone a bit higher up the food chain.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: At once.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: What are you planning, Signor Bellone?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: I will give you two options.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The first option is to reopen Enzo's case. This time, I'll be present, and so will associates of Famiglia Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I guarantee the trial will be safe.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The second option: leave this place.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Out of respect for the law, I will escort you to the city gates, but beyond that, we cannot guarantee your safety.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You are serious about this?
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I also guarantee that the judgment you issue will be carried out.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Then, obviously, I pick the first option.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: Even if I were to die immediately after this trial, I would gladly choose this option.
attributes.name: Old Judge

attributes.content: You will not die. Otherwise, I wouldn't know how to explain all this to Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You need to give her a message from me—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In the future, if and when she travels to Volsinii, the Bellones will protect her, as always.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Now, go prepare to reopen the case.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You never told me about this. My teacher never told me about this.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Back then, telling you would have only hurt you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Judge Russo was planning to tell you, before his death.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But I told him I'd tell you when the time was right.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You picked a good time, indeed.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I know you were worried that when I woke up, I would be devastated by everything that happened during Carnevale.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But I sincerely mean it when I say—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I feel grateful, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You see, history repeats itself.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Back then, Volsinii was dangerous and chaotic.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Amid the fighting famiglie, no one cared about the lives of the ordinary people, and so Judge Russo became a blade of vengeance.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And now, although Nuova Volsinii has its flaws, the implementation of the 'New Urban Management Act' has been highly effective.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Admittedly, in areas we overlooked, Irene came close to making a foolish decision—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But that was merely a close call.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm relieved to hear you feel that way.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We all know that many things have changed.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: All we need to do is try a little harder... that's all.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo
